messages.content:
I want to create a CSV with columns: name of oil, properties list, fragrance wheel notes. The properties should be emotional and physical. The fragrance wheel you can find online has a bunch of notes to use. Make a sheet that's helpful for a workshop to have couples use the oils to make a couples perfume. 
oils for list:
Pink Lotus - sensuous and stimulating floral 
Amber Perfume Oil 
Frangipani  -  Confident Floral Scent 
Petrichor  - Soaked Earth Mitti  
Assam Oud- leathery, woody 
Cambodian Oud - Earthy, rich
Lebanese Orange Blossom Oil -
Cedar leaf - foresty
Henna - Spicy & Buttery
Gardenia - Sweet delicate  
Sandalwood - Calming
Bakul Attar-  creamy fragrant  
Oakmoss -Soothing, Earthy
Frankincense  - Sweet, & Citric aroma
Fougere -Stimulating  sweet
Ylang Ylang Essential Oil-
Lavender Essential Oil -

Sure, let's define the properties and fragrance wheel notes for each oil. The properties will include both emotional and physical aspects, and the fragrance wheel notes are based on a basic four-category system: Fresh, Floral, Oriental, and Woody. Note that these characteristics are subjective and can vary based on individual perception.

CSV content:

```csv
Oil Name,Properties,Fragrance Wheel Notes
Pink Lotus,"Sensuous, Stimulating, Emotional Uplift, Enhances Sensuality",Floral
Amber Perfume Oil,"Calming, Balancing, Strengthens Connection, Enhances Harmony",Oriental
Frangipani,"Confidence Booster, Aids Concentration, Emotional Balance",Floral
Petrichor,"Grounding, Calming, Rejuvenating, Promotes Tranquility",Earthy (Fresh)
Assam Oud,"Bold, Mysterious, Enhances Alertness, Boosts Confidence",Woody
Cambodian Oud,"Rich, Earthy, Encourages Mindfulness, Promotes Relaxation",Woody
Lebanese Orange Blossom Oil,"Uplifting, Revitalizing, Promotes Joy, Enhances Creativity",Floral
Cedar Leaf,"Calming, Grounding, Encourages Strength, Boosts Self-Esteem",Woody
Henna,"Spicy, Exotic, Encourages Creativity, Boosts Passion",Oriental
Gardenia,"Sweet, Delicate, Calming, Promotes Harmony",Floral
Sandalwood,"Calming, Balancing, Promotes Tranquility, Enhances Focus",Woody
Bakul Attar,"Creamy, Fragrant, Emotional Uplift, Promotes Positivity",Floral
Oakmoss,"Soothing, Grounding, Encourages Resilience, Promotes Balance",Earthy (Fresh)
Frankincense,"Sweet, Citric, Uplifting, Enhances Spiritual Connection",Oriental
Fougere,"Stimulating, Sweet, Enhances Alertness, Promotes Positivity",Fresh
Ylang Ylang Essential Oil,"Sensual, Uplifting, Promotes Harmony, Enhances Passion",Floral
Lavender Essential Oil,"Calming, Soothing, Promotes Relaxation, Enhances Tranquility",Fresh
```

This CSV can be used to understand the properties and fragrance notes of each oil, assisting couples in choosing oils that reflect their individual preferences and their shared dynamic, enhancing the overall perfume-making experience.

Sure, here's a markdown table based on the data:

| Oil Name                   | Properties                                           | Fragrance Wheel Notes |
|----------------------------|------------------------------------------------------|-----------------------|
| Pink Lotus                 | Sensuous, Stimulating, Emotional Uplift, Enhances Sensuality | Floral                |
| Amber Perfume Oil          | Calming, Balancing, Strengthens Connection, Enhances Harmony | Oriental              |
| Frangipani                 | Confidence Booster, Aids Concentration, Emotional Balance | Floral                |
| Petrichor                  | Grounding, Calming, Rejuvenating, Promotes Tranquility | Earthy (Fresh)        |
| Assam Oud                  | Bold, Mysterious, Enhances Alertness, Boosts Confidence | Woody                 |
| Cambodian Oud              | Rich, Earthy, Encourages Mindfulness, Promotes Relaxation | Woody                 |
| Lebanese Orange Blossom Oil | Uplifting, Revitalizing, Promotes Joy, Enhances Creativity | Floral                |
| Cedar Leaf                 | Calming, Grounding, Encourages Strength, Boosts Self-Esteem | Woody                 |
| Henna                      | Spicy, Exotic, Encourages Creativity, Boosts Passion | Oriental              |
| Gardenia                   | Sweet, Delicate, Calming, Promotes Harmony | Floral                |
| Sandalwood                 | Calming, Balancing, Promotes Tranquility, Enhances Focus | Woody                 |
| Bakul Attar                | Creamy, Fragrant, Emotional Uplift, Promotes Positivity | Floral                |
| Oakmoss                    | Soothing, Grounding, Encourages Resilience, Promotes Balance | Earthy (Fresh)        |
| Frankincense               | Sweet, Citric, Uplifting, Enhances Spiritual Connection | Oriental              |
| Fougere                    | Stimulating, Sweet, Enhances Alertness, Promotes Positivity | Fresh                 |
| Ylang Ylang Essential Oil  | Sensual, Uplifting, Promotes Harmony, Enhances Passion | Floral                |
| Lavender Essential Oil     | Calming, Soothing, Promotes Relaxation, Enhances Tranquility | Fresh                 |
can you go further out on the fragrance wheel and get us "deeper" leaves on the chart?

Of course! An expanded fragrance wheel has more categories, allowing for a more detailed and nuanced classification of scents. Some of the categories may include Floral, Oriental, Woody, Fruity, Citrus, Green, Oceanic, Spicy, and others. Here's the updated table:

| Oil Name                   | Properties                                           | Fragrance Wheel Notes |
|----------------------------|------------------------------------------------------|-----------------------|
| Pink Lotus                 | Sensuous, Stimulating, Emotional Uplift, Enhances Sensuality | Floral - Subtropical |
| Amber Perfume Oil          | Calming, Balancing, Strengthens Connection, Enhances Harmony | Oriental - Resinous |
| Frangipani                 | Confidence Booster, Aids Concentration, Emotional Balance | Floral - Tropical |
| Petrichor                  | Grounding, Calming, Rejuvenating, Promotes Tranquility | Earthy - Mineralic |
| Assam Oud                  | Bold, Mysterious, Enhances Alertness, Boosts Confidence | Woody - Leathery |
| Cambodian Oud              | Rich, Earthy, Encourages Mindfulness, Promotes Relaxation | Woody - Mossy/Earthy |
| Lebanese Orange Blossom Oil | Uplifting, Revitalizing, Promotes Joy, Enhances Creativity | Floral - Citrus |
| Cedar Leaf                 | Calming, Grounding, Encourages Strength, Boosts Self-Esteem | Woody - Coniferous |
| Henna                      | Spicy, Exotic, Encourages Creativity, Boosts Passion | Oriental - Spicy |
| Gardenia                   | Sweet, Delicate, Calming, Promotes Harmony | Floral - White Floral |
| Sandalwood                 | Calming, Balancing, Promotes Tranquility, Enhances Focus | Woody - Dry Wood |
| Bakul Attar                | Creamy, Fragrant, Emotional Uplift, Promotes Positivity | Floral - Sweet Floral |
| Oakmoss                    | Soothing, Grounding, Encourages Resilience, Promotes Balance | Woody - Mossy/Earthy |
| Frankincense               | Sweet, Citric, Uplifting, Enhances Spiritual Connection | Oriental - Resinous |
| Fougere                    | Stimulating, Sweet, Enhances Alertness, Promotes Positivity | Green - Fresh Cut Grass |
| Ylang Ylang Essential Oil  | Sensual, Uplifting, Promotes Harmony, Enhances Passion | Floral - Tropical |
| Lavender Essential Oil     | Calming, Soothing, Promotes Relaxation, Enhances Tranquility | Floral - Soft Floral |

Please note that while these categories can provide a more detailed description, the perception of fragrances can be highly individual and subjective. This table should be used as a guide, allowing each couple to choose the scents that best reflect their preferences and emotional connections.
